category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 17-2 (Training Time and Method)
contents: Article 17-2 (Training time and method) ① The training time for each safety and health training course for workers shall be as follows. However, if the general management manager approves, the training time may be adjusted considering the characteristics of the training. Revised December 16, 2022, 1. Regular education corresponding to each item, a. All workers of the industrial complex: 3 hours or more per quarter, B. Supervisor: 16 hours or more per year, 2. Training when hiring workers, excluding workers employed for less than 1 month (hereinafter referred to as *daily workers): 8 hours or more, 3. Training when changing work details for workers, excluding daily workers: More than 2 hours, ② The contents of safety and health education for each subject shall follow Items A to C of Item 1 of Table 5 of the Enforcement Rules of the Industrial Safety Act., [This Article Newly Inserted on December 22, 2021]
